home.title: Aperçu
home.welcome: Welcome to our website! We are happy to have you here.

contactForm.description: You can also connect with me through my social media profiles:

homePage.welcomeTitle: Welcome to Our Full-Stack Development Services
homePage.welcomeText1: We specialize in creating customized full-stack applications tailored to your business needs. Our team of experts is dedicated to delivering high-quality solutions from concept to deployment.
homePage.welcomeText2: Whether you're looking to build a new application or enhance an existing one, we offer a range of services to help you achieve your goals efficiently and effectively.
homePage.service1: Custom Full-Stack Development: Tailored solutions for web and mobile applications.
homePage.service2: Consultation: Expert advice to define your project requirements and goals.
homePage.service3: UI/UX Design: Creating user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces.
homePage.service4: Integration: Seamlessly connecting your application with third-party services.
homePage.service5: Ongoing Support: Continuous maintenance and support to ensure your application runs smoothly.
homePage.getStartedText: Ready to start your project? Contact us today to discuss your needs and get a free consultation.

servicePage.title: Our Services
servicePage.intro: Welcome to our service page! We offer a range of solutions to help you build and maintain your digital presence. Whether you need a basic website or a full-scale enterprise application, our team is ready to assist you at every step.
servicePage.customSolutionsIntro: Need a custom solution? Contact us to discuss your project requirements. Our team will work with you to create a custom plan that fits your budget and timeline.
servicePage.customSolutionsDescription: Our custom solutions are tailored to your specific needs. We offer:
customSolutionsList: Custom pricing based on your project requirements
servicePage.contactCTA: Get in touch with us today to get started on your custom solution.

service.basicDescription: For small projects and personal use. Includes essential features.
service.intermediateDescription: Perfect for growing businesses needing more resources and flexibility.
service.advancedDescription: Advanced tools and customization for larger applications.
service.enterpriseDescription: Full-scale solutions for businesses requiring a dedicated team.

pricingPage.introText1: Choose the right plan for your needs. We offer flexible pricing for all types of applications, from small projects to large-scale enterprise solutions.
pricingPage.customPlansText1: Need a custom plan? Contact us to discuss your project requirements.
pricingPage.customPlansText2: Our team will work with you to create a custom plan that fits your budget and timeline.
pricingPage.customPlansList1: Custom pricing based on your project requirements
pricingPage.customPlansText4: Get in touch with us today to get started on your custom plan.

support.title: Support:

1-month post-launch maintenance.

support.title: Support:

support.title: Support:

Full support during business hours,

support.title: Support:
support.details: 24/7 support and full post-launch maintenance for the contract duration.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.intro: Hi, I'm Jean-Michel Bérubé, a bilingual full-stack developer based in Montreal, Quebec. I specialize in custom software solutions with expertise in DevOps, Docker, networking, AI tools, and monitoring. With an AEC in Programmer Analyst from LaSalle College, I have developed a strong foundation in software development.
aboutMe.experience: My experience spans across multiple industries, from IT management to creative work in photography and short films. I'm passionate about problem-solving, innovation, and leveraging AI tools like OpenAI and Copilot to create unique and effective solutions. As a self-employed software developer, I am always looking for new challenges and ways to improve my skills.

values.title: My Values
values.text: I am committed to integrity, innovation, and delivering high-quality software solutions. I believe in continuous learning, collaboration, and fostering creativity in my projects. These values guide me in providing the best possible service to clients and stakeholders.

skills.title: Skills
skills.intro: Over the years, I’ve honed my skills in various technologies, including:
list: React, JavaScript, Python, SQL (MS SQL, PL/SQL, MySQL)

location.title: Location
location.text: Based in Montreal, Quebec, I'm open to both remote and local opportunities. Feel free to reach out for collaboration or to discuss new projects!

contactPage.infoText: Welcome to our contact page. Feel free to reach out to us for any questions, information requests, or assistance. We are here to help.

additionalInfo.title: Have a Plan in Mind?
additionalInfo.text: If you have a project or idea and want to know how we can assist you, visit our Services Page to learn more about the solutions we offer and how we can bring your vision to life.

sorryPageNotFound: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
returnHomeOrContact: You might want to return to the home page or check out our contact page if you need assistance.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Plan
enterprise.introText1: The Enterprise Plan is designed for large organizations or projects with extensive requirements. It offers advanced features and customizations to support complex needs and scale efficiently.
enterprise.introText2: The Enterprise Plan is ideal for businesses that need robust solutions and flexibility. It includes comprehensive tools and dedicated support to ensure seamless integration and operation.
enterprise.feature1: Advanced Customization: Tailor the solution to your specific needs with extensive options.
enterprise.feature2: Scalability: Easily scale your operations with support for large volumes and complex requirements.
enterprise.feature3: Dedicated Support: Get priority support and dedicated account management to resolve issues quickly.
enterprise.additionalInfo: This plan is perfect for large enterprises looking for top-tier features and support. Contact us for a detailed consultation and to explore how we can assist in achieving your goals.

basic.title: Basic Plan
basic.description: The Basic Plan is tailored for individuals or small projects requiring essential features. It offers fundamental tools to help you get started with an efficient and streamlined approach.
features: Core functionalities to meet basic needs
basic.descriptionMobile: The Basic Plan is perfect for those looking for a straightforward solution with essential features. The mobile version ensures a seamless experience on the go.

coreFunctionality.label: Core Functionality
coreFunctionality.description: Essential tools to get started quickly.

responsiveLayout.label: Responsive Layout
responsiveLayout.description: Optimized for both web and mobile devices.

basic.additionalInfo: This plan is ideal for individuals or small-scale projects that require a straightforward and efficient solution. As your needs evolve, upgrade options are available. For further information or support, please don't hesitate to contact us.

intermediate.title: Intermediate Plan
intermediate.description: The Intermediate Plan is designed for chat applications and projects that require advanced features and seamless integrations. This plan includes:

features.label: Google Authentication
features.description: Secure and easy user authentication using Google’s login services.

features.label: OpenAI Integration
features.description: Leverage OpenAI’s powerful AI to provide intelligent and interactive chat functionalities.

features.label: Python Backend API
features.description: Build a robust backend with Python to handle complex logic and user interactions.

features.label: MySQL Database
features.description: Reliable data storage and management with MySQL for handling user data and chat histories.

features.label: Advanced Security
features.description: Implement strong security measures to protect user data and ensure a safe user experience.

intermediate.descriptionMobile: This plan provides a comprehensive solution for developing advanced chat applications. With Google authentication for secure logins and OpenAI’s API for sophisticated chat features, paired with a Python backend and MySQL database, you’ll have all the tools needed for a high-performance and secure application.

mobileFeatures.label: Google Authentication
mobileFeatures.description: Simplify user logins with Google’s secure authentication system.

mobileFeatures.label: OpenAI Integration
mobileFeatures.description: Integrate OpenAI’s AI capabilities to create dynamic and engaging chat interactions.

mobileFeatures.label: Python Backend API
mobileFeatures.description: Utilize Python to build a powerful backend that supports your chat application’s functionality.

mobileFeatures.label: MySQL Database
mobileFeatures.description: Manage user data and chat histories efficiently with a reliable MySQL database.

mobileFeatures.label: Advanced Security
mobileFeatures.description: Ensure the protection of user data with advanced security protocols and measures.

googleAuth.label: Google Authentication
googleAuth.description: Simplify user logins with Google’s secure authentication system.

openAI.label: OpenAI Integration
openAI.description: Integrate OpenAI’s AI capabilities to create dynamic and engaging chat interactions.

pythonAPI.label: Python Backend API
pythonAPI.description: Utilize Python to build a powerful backend that supports your chat application’s functionality.

mysqlDB.label: MySQL Database
mysqlDB.description: Manage user data and chat histories efficiently with a reliable MySQL database.

advancedSecurity.label: Advanced Security
advancedSecurity.description: Ensure the protection of user data with advanced security protocols and measures.

intermediate.additionalInfo: This plan is ideal for developing chat applications with advanced features and secure integrations. Contact us to learn more about how we can tailor this plan to meet your specific needs and to get started on your project.

advanced.title: Advanced Plan
advanced.description: The Advanced Plan is designed for comprehensive social media applications, like a Twitter clone. This plan includes all essential functionalities to build a fully-featured social media platform with advanced features and integrations:

features.label: User Management
features.description: Efficient handling of user accounts, profiles, and settings.

features.label: Messaging System
features.description: Real-time messaging capabilities for seamless communication between users.

features.label: Tweets and Posts
features.description: Functionality for creating, managing, and interacting with tweets and posts.

features.label: Likes and Followers
features.description: Features to manage user interactions such as likes and follower relationships.

advanced.descriptionMobile: This plan offers a comprehensive solution for building a fully-featured social media platform. With advanced user management, real-time messaging, and rich interaction features, supported by a robust backend and modern design, your application will deliver an exceptional user experience.

mobileFeatures.label: User Management
mobileFeatures.description: Seamless handling of user profiles and accounts.

mobileFeatures.label: Responsive Design
mobileFeatures.description: A modern and adaptable design for all devices.

mobileFeatures.label: FastAPI Backend
mobileFeatures.description: Efficient API management and server-side logic.

modernDesign.label: Modern Design
modernDesign.description: Responsive and visually appealing design for an optimal user experience on all devices.

fastAPI.label: FastAPI Backend
fastAPI.description: High-performance backend for efficient data processing and API interactions.

pythonIntegration.label: Python Integration
pythonIntegration.description: Utilizes Python for backend logic and processing.

reactFrontend.label: React Frontend
reactFrontend.description: Interactive and dynamic frontend built with React for a rich user experience.

mysqlDB.label: MySQL Database
mysqlDB.description: Reliable and scalable data storage solution.

advanced.additionalInfo: This Advanced Plan is perfect for building a sophisticated social media platform with all the necessary features and integrations. Contact us to discuss how we can tailor this plan to your specific project needs and get started on creating your ideal application.
